events.description: China reports the outbreak of a mysterious lung disease.
A new type of virus has been identified.
WHO declares "international health emergency". The first cases of corona have been reported in Europe.

events.event: WHO officially declares previous epidemic a global pandemic
events.description: WHO officially declares previous epidemic a global pandemic.
Europe becomes a Corona hotspot. Social isolation is introduced in DE and curfews in FR. In addition, Italy"s healthcare system is at its limit.

events.event: Travelers returning from risk areas must get tested
events.description: Travelers returning from risk areas must get tested.
The second wave arises in Europe. The Healthcare systems are overburdened.

events.event: Recommendation for a common approach to travel regulations
events.description: European Council adopts recommendation for common approach to travel regulations.

events.event: First COVID-19 vaccine approved in the EU
events.description: First COVID-19 vaccine approved for use in the EU.
Virus variants alpha & beta have been reported. The mutation were first identified in the United Kingdom and in South Africa.
Virus variant gamma has been reported. The mutation was first identified in the Brazilian Amazon region.
The COVID-19 vaccines Moderna and AstraZeneca got approved.

events.event: Council updates recommendation on COVID-19 travel measures
events.description: Council updates recommendation on COVID-19 travel measures.
The COVID-19 vaccine Johnson&Johnson got approved.
Virus variant gamma has been reported. The mutation was first identified in India.

events.event: digital COVID certificate comes into force
events.description: EU digital COVID certificate comes into force.
Virus variant omikron has been reported. The mutation was first identified in South Africa.

events.event: European Council adopts new recommendation on COVID-19 travel regulations
events.description: European Council adopts new recommendation on COVID-19 travel regulations.
